headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Enphase Energy (ENPH) After A 47% One Year Share Price Fall
summary: If you are wondering whether Enphase Energy's current share price still reflects its long term potential or if it has swung too far in the other direction, you are not alone. The stock last closed at US$35.22, with returns of 3.6% over the past 7 days and 9.4% over the past 30 days, while the 1 year return sits at a 47.3% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns show declines of 85.7% and 81.5% respectively. Recent coverage around Enphase Energy has focused on its role within the solar and...
